title: Sere Training

content: quote: Originally posted by greywolfghost: quote: Originally posted by m551sheridan: you don't join up to be a SERE instructor... That's right! You get the crap beat out of you for several years by them, then you get to be one! We can't torture terrorists, but SERE Instructors can torture us!! How does THAT work?? as you no doubt already know SERE training is to condition us as to what the bad guys may do to us..... but then that is all lies; they are just simple farmers who only want to provide for their families.... I actually almost had an opportunity to go to SERE when I was going through phase training... but then we were denied. I would have liked to have done it tho.... I figured I could beat them at their own game... little did I know. One Flag......One Heart......One Nation............EVERMORE

content: I been through a couple of escape and evasion courses in the Army. Loved it - but I was the "Back woods" type back then. Becoming an animal an crawling in the dirt came pretty natural. Cheating helped, too...like a small compass between cheek and gum, small folded map between boot liner and sole, and a little flat pocket knife in the other - Anybody that got caught got the full harassment and back to the start to try all over again - - Never got caught once - because I went clear around the whole course. Alls fair in love and war - - Wandering and Wondering
reply: I been through a couple of escape and evasion courses in the Army. Loved it - but I was the "Back woods" type back then. Becoming an animal an crawling in the dirt came pretty natural. content: If you want to do SERE, come on over. I'll strip you naked, tie you to a chair, not give you anything but water once in awhile, and beat the crap out of you every 27 minutes like clockwork.

content: First, you have to go through Navy Seals Training, if you make it through that they give a break. Then you go to SERE, which is like a vacation compared to the Seals! Keep smiling, everyone will wonder what you've been up to!
